item.title: Hacking tools for web engineers
item.description: We, web engineers, love to use steady and up-to-date web servers, well-known authentication frameworks, and robust encryption libraries. We also issue Let’s encrypt certificates in order to encrypt our traffic, and leverage cloud private networks with well-thought-out security policies. Not even mention the salted hashes for storing passwords, and a lot more besides, and many many more security measures. We think our applications are rock solid, as secure as they can be.
